ifTrueActivities.name: Copy data for tobe processed folder

dependsOn.activity: Copy data for tobe processed folder

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(Modified_date) as NewWatermarkvalue from Source_tbl

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from Source_tbl where Modified_date > '@{activity('Lookupoldactivitydate').output.firstRow.Last_Max_date}' and Modified_date <= '@{activity('Lookupnewactivitydate').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: select MAX(Modified_date) as NewWatermarkvalue from Source_tbl
select MAX(Modified_date) as NewWatermarkvalue from Source_tbl

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from Source_tbl where Modified_date > '@{activity('Lookupoldactivitydate').output.firstRow.Last_Max_date}' and Modified_date <= '@{activity('Lookupnewactivitydate').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		InvoiceNo as string,
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as string,
		InvoiceDate as string,
		UnitPrice as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sqldatasink1
